item.title: Embracing the Advantages of Open Source Software with Site Bay
item.description: Open-source software (OSS) is a cornerstone of innovation and flexibility in technology, powering enterprises and personal projects alike.

item.title: What is Open Source Software?
item.description: Every application you use starts as an idea. No matter the platform itâ€™s installed on or its purpose, every piece of software begins in the planning phase.
